channel.title: FFS help [PI]
channel.description:
okay on my server when you click on lunar altar it disconects you from server i dont think its the altar though its when ever lunar spells is on when the lunar spellbook is on and you click on spellbook tab an error comes in cmd and it says this:
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8277) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1896) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
i do not understand tutorials on here nor can even find any if somebody adds me on msn burnleyladz@hotmail.co.uk i will reward you, you pick what you want i have rsbots + about 14 scripts i will give you co-owner of my server and something else if you want to, i desperatly need this fixed.

okay on my server when you click on lunar altar it disconects you from server i dont think its the altar though its when ever lunar spells is on when the lunar spellbook is on and you click on spellbook tab an error comes in cmd and it says this:
